name: Socks Bundle – Mockup and Template
description:
Strict and versatile cotton socks that are aware of their life purpose and please the owner with a light and unobtrusive irony.


Inspired by the way people wear their socks.


Problem. How people wear socks upside down and put them into the wrong leg.


Task. Make universal socks.


Cotton socks envelop the owner with unobtrusive irony and masterfully create an incredible tactile contact.

The socks are created in immaculate white and perfect black shades.

Materials: 80% cotton, 17% polyamide, 3% elastane, and 100% of absolute coolness and style.




  • Condition: new & 100% Official product
  • Design Feature: pack of four socks in a gift box
  • Design feature: seamless knitting to create a sock with no stitches
  • Design feature: blue, tartan, black, and red pairs
  • Sizes available: L: 41-46 UK (7½-11½) US (8-12)
  • Washing Instructions: Wash inside out (40ºC/100ºF max). Do not tumble dry, iron, bleach, or dry clean
  • Colour: Multicolour
  • Category: socks themed
